display_long_description:
Step into a realm where musical precision meets virtual reality with Berklee Online’s Ear Trainer app. Immerse yourself in a captivating journey through melodic landscapes, where every note becomes a stepping stone in your quest to elevate your auditory skills. Picture yourself racing against the metronome, honing your ability to identify intricate note relationships with each beat.

Brought to you by award winning Berklee Online, this app is designed for both seasoned musicians and those just beginning their musical adventure. It seamlessly transforms the often-challenging practice of ear training into an engaging and interactive experience. Whether you're a virtuoso looking to fine-tune your pitch perception or a novice exploring the wonders of musical harmony, our Ear Trainer VR app provides a dynamic platform to enhance your musical prowess and make the art of sound truly come alive.

This is an early prototype of Berklee Online’s Ear Trainer experience.
